item.title: I could not watch The Passengers
item.description: 10:59 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Kinda reasonable premise, if interstellar travel were to be done through 3D space. Synopsis: I wish I hadn’t read the synopsis. 11:34 Monday 09 October 2017 JST Actually, I turned it off after the first hour; I did not see any way it could end well and did not want to see them suffer.
